video.title: Networks: Network Interface Card
video.description:
We're busy people who learn to code, then practice by building projects for nonprofits. Learn Full-stack JavaScript, build a portfolio, and get great references with our open source community.

Join our community at https://freecodecamp.com
Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/freecodecamp
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/freecodecamp
Follow Quincy on Quora: https://www.quora.com/Quincy-Larson

topLevelComment.author: Dhèeraj
topLevelComment.text: The accent of this guy is so thick and hard to understand. He sucks.

replies.author: Mr. Jax
replies.text: Weird way to spell "concise, thank you"

topLevelComment.author: Besnik Abrashi
topLevelComment.text: The Videos are placed in the reverse order. For example, the first one is placed last and the last one is placed first. This is very confusing. I propose that you change the order of the videos.

replies.author: freeCodeCamp.org
replies.text: Thanks for pointing this out. We incorrectly sequenced these videos when we uploaded them. I've resequenced them. - Quincy
